author: stefanegli
msg: no-jira : use setup/teardown to properly stop an instance's heartbeats (which otherwise conflict with tests that run at a later stage in the same run)

author: rhuijben
msg: Fix issue #4415, under the assumption that Subversion clients receive the same
property twice in the same response and only use the properly escaped version.
(insert_prop_internal): Stop producing invalid xml for Subversion clients.
Provide an non-identical author name when we would fail and document why.

author: batkinson
msg: Refactored test to clarify the intent and simplify.

author: batkinson
msg: Corrected test causing intermittent run-order dependent build failures.
